name: Easy Digital Downloads – YMLP checkout checkbox
author: Danny van Kooten

sections.description:
YMLP integration for your Easy Digital Downloads checkout form

This plugin will add a sign-up checkbox to your Easy Digital Downloads checkout form. When customers check this checkbox, they will be subscribed to the YMLP group of your choice.

More information

Check out more WordPress plugins by Danny van Kooten or contact him on Twitter.
sections.installation:
Installing the plugin

  1. In your WordPress admin panel, go to Plugins > New Plugin, search for Easy Digital Downloads – YMLP checkout checkbox and click “Install now”
  2. Alternatively, download the plugin and upload the contents of edd-ymlp.zip to your plugins directory, which usually is /wp-content/plugins/.
  3. Activate the plugin.

Configuring the plugin

  1. Go to Downloads > Settings > Extensions and fill in your YMLP API key and username.
  2. Save your settings, a dropdown with your YMLP groups will show up.
  3. Select the groups you want to subscribe customers to.
  4. (Optional) Customize the label text, load default CSS and select whether the checkbox should be prechecked.
